article_metadata.description: Whatever happened to the soaring rhetoric of presidential candidate Barack Obama? Well, candidate Obama certainly didn’t show up at the State of the Union address last week. Then again, candidate Obama didn’t have a record to defend. President Obama did.In 2008, Barack Obama campaigned as a long-awaited political messiah, determined to transcend partisan and ideological divides and unite people across the aisle for common cause.Campaigning and governing are two very different
article_metadata.author: Frank Mazzaglia Local Columnist
